text: niscayanga, evaraite, tama daggara, elanti pramanam lenide allah sucanalanu (ayat lanu) gurinci vaduladutaro, vari hrdayalalo vastavaniki goppatanapu garvam nindi undi. Kani varu danini (goppatananni) pondajalaru. Kavuna nivu allah saranu veduko. Niscayanga, ayane sarvam vinevadu, sarvam cusevadu
